name: 洪子逸
objective: 本課程旨在介紹供應鏈管理中之相關問題及議題 。其中包含產業分析、e化概念、需求及供應管理、長鞭效應、存貨管理、延遲理論、及供應鏈管理實務。
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Understanding the Supply Chain
Week 3 Supply Chain Performance
Week 4 Supply Chain Drivers and Metrics
Week 5 Designing Distribution Networks and Applications to e-Business
Week 6 Network Design in the Supply Chain
Week 7 Network Design in an Uncertain Environment
Week 8 Demand Forecasting in a Supply Chain
Week 9 Aggregate Planning in a Supply Chain
Week 10 Planning Supply and Demand in a Supply Chain
Week 11 Managing Economies of Scale in a Supply Chain
Week 12 Managing Uncertainty in a Supply Chain
Week 13 Determining the Optimal Level of Product Availability
Week 14 Transportation in a Supply Chain
Week 15 Sourcing Decisions in a Supply Chain
Week 16 Pricing and Revenue Management in a Supply Chain
Week 17 Information Technology and Coordination in a Supply Chain
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
課堂報告：30%
期末考：40%
課堂表現：30%
materials:
Text Book:
Chopra, S, & Meindl, P. (2007). Supply Chain Management: Strategy, Planning & Operations, 3rd Ed., Prentice-Hall.
Reference Book:
蘇雄義（2008），供應鏈管理：原理、程序、實務，智勝文化。
